colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @021A *, ,(CES RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED BTUD LAS RNAM RGYAL GYI SMON LAM SHIS BRJOD THAR BAR 'DREN PA'I SHING RTA ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI RANG GI GAM TU GNAS PA'I SKU GZHOGS GRVA TSANG DANG SMAN BLA GRVA TSANG THUN MONG BA'I SLOB DPON RIN PO CHE BKRA SHIS RNAM RGYAL GYI DPAL BZANG PO'I RGYUN @021B DU ZHAL 'DON LA CHO GA CHA LAG TSANG BA LA DGONGS SHING, LHAG PAR TSE 'DAS DGE SNYEN MA TSE RING DPAL MO'I YAR 'DREN GYI PHYIR DU DMIGS NAS 'DI LTA BU DGOS BKA' NAN CHE BAR BEBS PA LTAR LAM 'DI LA MOS PA'I BLO CAN SKU SKYE RAB 'BYAMS SMRA BA BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS MING GZHAN, RGYAL DBANG THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA CHEN PO'I BKA' LUNG GIS DZA YA PAndI TA KHU THUG THU ZHES 'BOD PAS 'PHAGS YUL TU BHA WA ZHES 'BOD CING, RGYA NAG GI YUL GRUR ZHES GRAGS PA DNGOS PO ZHES SHING PHO KHYI LO'I HOR ZLA DANG PO PHYI MA'I BCU DGU LA SBYAR BA 'DIS KYANG RDO RJE THEG PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
author_simple: DZA YA PAndI TA KHU THUG THU,
